sn42.10:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn42.10:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena rājantepure rājaparisāya sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
sn42.10:4.3: “kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, sādiyanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, paṭiggaṇhanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajatan”ti.
sn42.10:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena maṇicūḷako gāmaṇi tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
sn42.10:5.2: Atha kho maṇicūḷako gāmaṇi taṃ parisaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.10:5.3: “mā ayyo evaṃ avacuttha.
sn42.10:5.4: Na kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, na sādiyanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nappaṭiggaṇhanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇā samaṇā sakyaputtiyā apetajātarūparajatā”ti.
sn42.10:5.5: Asakkhi kho maṇicūḷako gāmaṇi taṃ parisaṃ saññāpetuṃ.
sn42.10:5.6: Atha kho maṇicūḷako gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.10:5.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho maṇicūḷako gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.10:5.9: “idha, bhante, rājantepure rājaparisāya sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
sn42.10:5.10: ‘kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, sādiyanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, paṭiggaṇhanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajatan’ti.
sn42.10:5.11: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ parisaṃ etadavocaṃ:
sn42.10:5.13: Na kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, na sādiyanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nappaṭiggaṇhanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇā samaṇā sakyaputtiyā apetajātarūparajatā’ti.
sn42.10:5.14: Asakkhiṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, taṃ parisaṃ saññāpetuṃ.
sn42.10:5.15: Kaccāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhāmi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti?
sn42.10:6.1: “Taggha tvaṃ, gāmaṇi, evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhasi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
sn42.10:6.2: Na hi, gāmaṇi, kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, na sādiyanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nappaṭiggaṇhanti samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jātarūparajataṃ, nikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇā samaṇā sakyaputtiyā apetajātarūparajatā.
sn42.10:6.3: Yassa kho, gāmaṇi, jātarūparajataṃ kappati, pañcapi tassa kāmaguṇā kappanti.
sn42.10:6.4: Yassa pañca kāmaguṇā kappanti (), ekaṃsenetaṃ, gāmaṇi, dhāreyyāsi assamaṇadhammo asakyaputtiyadhammoti.
sn42.10:6.6: tiṇaṃ tiṇatthikena pariyesitabbaṃ, dāru dārutthikena pariyesitabbaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sakaṭatthikena pariyesitabbaṃ, puriso purisatthikena pariyesitabbo.
sn42.10:6.7: Na tvevāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, kenaci pariyāyena ‘jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabban’ti vadāmī”ti.
